from notebookutils import mssparkutils

# Builds DIMs for the LPA fact
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_all_appeals_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_lpa_resposability_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_picaso_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_high_hedges_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_plans_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_hedgerow_dim')


# Builds LPA FACT
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_local_planning_authority_fact') 

# Builds Event
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_event_dim')
mssparkutils.notebook.run('/odw-harmonised/Casework/casework_event_fact')
